meanings.definition: A person who has a fear or hatred of cats.
meanings.sent1: My friend is an ailurophobe and always avoids going to places where there might be cats.
meanings.sent2: The ailurophobe crossed the street to avoid a stray cat that was approaching.
meanings.sent3: The ailurophobe's heart raced as they spotted a fluffy cat sitting on their doorstep.
meanings.sent4: To the ailurophobe, cats were like tiny, furry monsters lurking in the shadows.
meanings.sent5: The ailurophobe's fear of cats was so intense that even a picture of a cat made them shudder.
